website_summaries.verdict: You'll appreciate the numerous size options, different color choices, and well-designed ear holes.
pros: Smart-looking design of this helmet will give players excellent padding and protection around the ears and jaws
6 different color options available, along with three sizes
Helmet provides a lower profile for a great looking fit
cons: Suggested sizes occasionally seem to be a bit off, leading to issues with fit

customer_reviews.title: threw a ball really hard at his head, no ...
customer_reviews.text: threw a ball really hard at his head, no concussion. Kidding. Fits snug, face shield attached without drilling or tearing pads. Very clean helmet, kid loves it
customer_reviews.author: FTWTX102

customer_reviews.title: Eat Your Vegetables
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old son has never complained about the fit. Looks awesome with team logo on it. Have gotten lots if compliments. Tip: Take the time to research size guides and use an actual measuring tape on your child's head before ordering so you dont blame Demarini....just sayin
customer_reviews.author: Evets

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits perfectly for larger sized heads. The shell is constructed with hard durable plastic and the foam padding gives a snug fit without making it uncomfortable. Pads feel like they are securely glued onto the shell so I don't feel like they will be coming off. Great price for a nicely made product.
customer_reviews.author: AutoxSTI

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, I use a 71/2 size hat and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, I use a 71/2 size hat and this helmet fits snugly with the padding, the only reason I am giving it a 4 star instead of 5 is because the pircture has a black matte look to it and the product is actually pretty glossy, I would buy this helmet again and will most likely do so if i wear this one out. I am a 5'10" adult and will use this for my fast pitch softball league in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 9 yr old to play baseball
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these helmets for my 10 yr to play baseball and it works great. He's got a somewhat small head and this fits great with his hat on. We then found out my younger son's baseball team didn't have enough helmets so we decided to get him his own as well. This also fits him snug with his baseball cap on as well. Much cheaper than the ones at the local athletic store.
customer_reviews.author: happy mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great name, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is outstanding! No scratches nor anything else. The only negative note could be the color: charcoal grey is more... light charcoal grey (comparing to the classic one). For sure, it's lighter than the one in the product picture. Also, from the main pic, it seems totally a "different" helmet. Apart from that, no complaint!
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good looking
customer_reviews.text: This fit my 7 1/2 year old son better than the expensive models in the stores, which were too loose. I was planning on having him wear his baseball cap if it was loose, but no need. He is 49 inches tall, 56 pounds, average build. Also, we bought the gray helmet, which is maybe not as matte as the picture makes it look... A slight shine... But it's close and it's a good looking helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Great batting helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great batting helmet. I don't play sports, but I bought this for the batting range, so I didn't have to wear their helmets. It protected my head, when a pop-up I hit came down on the side of my head. I didn't feel anything! Overall, this helmet has a comfortable fit, and it's really stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Aijo

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old son. He likes the shiny white color. It has held up well so far this season and hope to have it for another season or two. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8-year old son with a big head!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bardsley

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I used these for gifts for some of my girls on a softball team that were graduating from from the ledge and moving to high school. I has the player sign it. It was sturdy, easy to write on.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA ESPINOZA

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Tight
customer_reviews.text: While I do not like getting a high and tight Fastball near my head, I feel better with this on my head. Nice and hard on the outside, soft and luxurious on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Maday

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son has a larger than average head, and he wears sports googles. This is one of the few helmets that is comfortable and allows him to easily put his goggles on. Great value, too!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: If it protects me, I guess it has done its job. However, the fit is really strange. The ear piece feels too far forward, so it’ll take some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Small for tee ball
customer_reviews.text: Great for little head tee ballers. Seems smaller than most other brands which is good. Son is 5 and on smaller side and helmet fits perfect, no wiggle.
customer_reviews.author: Grandeson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and provided the safety & reassurance we needed for fall ball season. I will definitely keep this brand in mind for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: This was a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got more than advertised. I got a facemark included even though not included in pic or description
customer_reviews.author: sbulthui

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old not tight with room ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old not tight with room to grow without be so loose it bounces around as he runs.
customer_reviews.author: Klr

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size to give room for my son to grow into. He wears a size 7 hat. The helmet is just slightly loose, but wearing a hat with it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My NAVY looks like a darker Royal...Not close to pic of navy...Helmet fit is good Had a new one sent thinking it was a mistake but it's the same royal blue shade...not navy at all...but will keep it anyway now
customer_reviews.author: JT NEXT LEVEL

customer_reviews.title: ... we have this exact helmet in blue and its great. Good visual with the available mask
customer_reviews.text: Haven't received the red helmet yet however we have this exact helmet in blue and its great. Good visual with the available mask. My son batted 28 out of 29 wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory McCann

customer_reviews.title: Great color and fit, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit, great quality. Purchase this for my 10-year-old for baseball.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable helmet.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son really likes the helmet. It has a classic look and isn't too showy. He says it is comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: WishesUT

customer_reviews.title: Great range for different head sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great range for different head sizes. The padding in the helmet is thick enough to fit my 3rd grader, but soft enough to fit my adult head comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: kevpke

customer_reviews.title: but wearing a hat with it is perfect. I'm sure by next year it will fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size to give room for my son to grow into. He wears a size 7 hat. The helmet is just slightly loose, but wearing a hat with it is perfect. I'm sure by next year it will fit perfectly. He says it is comfortable and he likes it over some other brands we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jody L.

customer_reviews.title: Fits a big headed kid and an adult
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6 year old very well. He has a huge head! Slight room for growth!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim youth helmet!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using it for 2 months and it’s a great helmet. It’s not big like some of the other youth helmets. My son is 7 and it fits great.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for a good price. What more can you ask for.

customer_reviews.title: This fit my son like a glove
customer_reviews.text: This fit my son like a glove! Received it just in time for the tournament this past weekend. Very happy with my purchase! Great price as well!

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great batting helmet with lots of protection, looks great, and stays on well. Great batting helmet for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this helmet for my 7 year son, it fits great also it's comfortable. Arrived really quick shipped very protected and with some discounts from Baseball Express, the color is beautiful. The service was great I will recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: david santiago

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love standing in front of the ball machine and let it clunk me on the head.. witg this helmet im invisible

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Best price in town. Our 16 year old has no issues..!!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old, threw a black spider sticker on there and BOOM, Spiderman helmet ;)

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Protects your head. Comfortable. What else do you want?

customer_reviews.title: DeMarini batting helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, great protection and great feel...my son likes it.

customer_reviews.title: NICE FIT
customer_reviews.text: I like this batting helmet. My son has been using these since he was 7. They fit nice and snug.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this helmet. He said it is comfortable. It is a little bit bigger than some we tried. (My son is 19 and wears glasses).

customer_reviews.title: The padding is great, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this, very padded and stays on his head as needed.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a adult L/Xl for my (14yro) and it's way too small. It actually fit my nephew (8yro) better.

customer_reviews.text: my little guy loves his helmet and it fits his 5 year old head perfect without being loose

customer_reviews.title: Looks bettet in person and fits true

customer_reviews.title: Fit well for 9-10 yr old boy
customer_reviews.text: This is was 7 3/4 - 8 and fit well. the 6-7 was too small.

customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 7 year old grandson. While the helmet looks huge on his head, it fits extremely well and doesn’t shift around when he is batting or running.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet, great padding and excellent ventilation, perfect fit for my 8 year old daughter.

customer_reviews.text: Good helmet! Fits all four of our boys heads (ages 8-14). Shiny exterior shell, foam pads inside.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! So great someone took it at my ...

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect but thought it was nonglossy but they are glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped quickly. Just as advertised and the sizing was spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Sizing recommendation off.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this item I read reviews and suggested fitting sizes. My 9 yr old fits well into a 6 1/2 - 7 1/2. This helmet had that size listed stating would fit well. However this is NOT the size of the helmet. This helmet is 6 3/8 - 7 3/8 which is NOT the fit I needed for my son. Secondly, he is only into his 3rd game of the season and the padding is already ripping away from the inside of the helmet. Super disappointed. Would return, but have already customized with decals. Will definitely spend a little more money and purchase the Easton helmet next.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth Baseball Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice Youth Baseball helmet. It fit my 8 year olds head perfect... along with the majority of the rest of the team. He tells me that it is comfortable and he looks "cool" in it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT Buy Again. It came in HORRIBLE condition
customer_reviews.text: I have been so busy that I have not had a chance to review this item. It came in horrible and I mean HORRIBLE condition! It had scratches and it looked like it was broken on the sides. I was so angry!! My daughter needed it the same weekend I ordered it. It arrived on time, but it arrived looking used. The logo was coming off. It looked like it had been scraped off or scratched off purposely. I wish I would have had the time to post sooner. I actually took pictures of when it came fresh out of the box. Click on the pictures so you can see for yourself. The tags were still attached and everything.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof3royaldolls

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and it is the perfect size for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Factory Bar Code Stickers are Difficult to Remove without Disfiguring the Helment
customer_reviews.text: Removing the factory bar code sticker has made me wish that I did not buy this helmet. Instead of a simple to remove sticker, this one requires at least 15 minutes of work and disfigures the helmet. I damaged the first helmet by Goof Off to remove the sticker after Goo Gone failed. Finally I discovered that if I use dawn and water along with a lot of elbow grease, the stickers will come off with minimal damage. What should have taken 5 seconds now takes 15 minutes times 12 helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Solid helmet
customer_reviews.text: I feel very protected. Would highly recommend to anyone who wants to have their own helmet when going to the batting cages. No chance of getting lice when you have your own!
customer_reviews.author: GirlPower

customer_reviews.title: Thick foam very confortable and fits younger and skinny 13 year old boys
customer_reviews.text: Exellent product and perfect fit for a 5"8 225 LB man , thank you !
customer_reviews.author: ALAIN G CABRERA

product_meta.title: DeMarini Paradox Protege Pro Batting Helmet
product_meta.description: The all new Paradox protege batting helmet is designed with dual density padding to keep your dome protected and strategic venting system to keep you cool.
feature_bullets: -Dual density padding fitted specifically to your head size
- Sizing Based on Hat Size: YH (6 1/2 and Below), S/M (6 3/8-7 1/8), L/XL (7-7 5/8)
-To find the right batting helmet size, simply measure from the forehead around the head and back to the forehead, measuring the full head circumference.
